whatIsOkox.title: WHAT IS $OKOX?
whatIsOkox.subtitle: From Meme to Movement
points: On April 1, 2023, the official OKX account introduced a mascot during april fools.
It was supposed to be a one-day laugh.
But the internet had other plans.
Memes were born. Mentions kept coming.
And now, that same mascot lives onchain as a token powered by its community.
whatIsOkox.bottomLine: $OKOX isn't just a coin. It's a reminder that crypto culture builds itself — one meme at a time.

tokenomics.title: TOKENOMICS
tokenomics.subtitle: Built on Burn & Liquidity
tokenomics.burned: 10.63% — Burned and gone forever. Locked in liquidity
tokenomics.lockedLiquidity: 87.37% — Locked in liquidity. No team tokens. No funny business.

bridge.title: How to Bridge
bridge.description: Move $OKOX between chains in 3 easy steps

steps.step1: Step 1: Open OKX wallet app on your mobile & click dex
steps.step2: Step 2: From the swap menu click the "from"
steps.step3: Step 3: From the drop down select the token you want to swap from
steps.step5: Step 5: In the drop down, copy and paste the $OKOX contract address and select the token
steps.step6: Step 6: enter the amount, click swap & voila!! It's done.

timeline.title: COMMUNITY TIMELINE
timeline.subtitle: From April Fools to All-Time Highs
timeline.description: $OKOX started as a joke. Now it's building a story — powered by community, memes, and milestones. Every step adds to the legend. Every holder becomes part of history.

tweet1.text: On April 1, 2023, the official OKX account announced the mascot: 'Every great brand needs a mascot. OKX is excited to introduce ours: OKOX.'

tweet2.text: A few days later, on April 4th, the official OKX replied to a now-deleted comment using its mascot, OK OX.

tweet3.text: On April 15, 2024, an anonymous developer decides to launch one of the first coins on Xlayer, OKOX.

tweet4.text: On May 5, 2023, the OKX account once again teased the OKOX mascot along with Pepe. 'Don't let your memes be dreams'

tweet5.text: The team has since received multiple interactions from OKX official accounts in the meantime.

tweet6.text: On September 26, 2025, the developer handed over his 2% supply to the community.

bridgeDesktop.title: HOW TO BRIDGE ON DESKTOP
bridgeDesktop.subtitle: The Easy Way to Join the Party

steps.step1: Step 1: Open OKX wallet on your desktop & click connect wallet.
steps.step2: Step 2: Connect your wallet using QR or browser extension
steps.step3: Step 3: On your dashboard click swap from the top menu
steps.step4: Step 4: On the swap screen click "From"
steps.step5: Step 5: From the list select the chain & the token you want to swap from
steps.step6: Step 6: Click the "to" and paste copy paste the $OKOX contract address and select the token
steps.step7: Step 7: Once both selected, enter the amount, click swap and voila!!. It's done
